Articles.Content: What are the ways I can see biomes on kerbnet? Exactly which stock parts enable it?
Right click probe cores. I had trouble finding it too.
I think only some of the more advanced probe cores allow biome identification.

The OKTO2 is the first probe core that'll show biomes. The MPL will also show biomes. Any core that's higher tech than the OKTO2 will also show them, including the RoveMate.

Then go into the context menu for that core and click "KerbNet Access".

Edited October 30, 2016 by bewing

One last point, once you have the Kerbnet™ panel open, the button at the top right cycles between the two readouts, one of which shows the biomes.

Also, keep an eye on the Field of View slider towards the bottom if you want the scan to cover the largest area.
